Title: Othello
Actors: Sergey Bondarchuk, Irina Skobtseva, Andrei Popov, Vladimir Soshalsky
Plot: Othello is a Moorish military hero married to young and beautiful Desdemona. Envious Iago is scheming against Othello. By planting a fake evidence, Iago provokes Othello's suspicion of Desdemona's infidelity. Enraged Othello loses control and kills Desdemona, then realizes his mistake and kills himself.
